content: Non-interest expense was $2.8 million higher than the linked quarter, primarily as a result of $1.3 million of restructuring charges, higher equipment costs associated with technology, and the relocation of our regional administrative office in the Buffalo area, along with higher salaries and employee benefits, Income tax expense was $3.9 million in the quarter, representing an effective tax rate of 19.8% compared to $3.4 million and an effective tax rate of 18.7% in the first quarter of 2022.
